forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 62. West wind 15 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the early hours are marked by a soft whisper of clouds teasing the horizon, draped almost like a delicate shawl across the city. The temperature holds a cool embrace around 52 degrees, nudged along by a west wind that carries the promise of a day that will soon be painted in warmth and sunshine. By midday, the fog will recede, yielding to a clear canvas where the sun will reign supreme, nudging temperatures closer to a pleasant 62 degrees, all while the wind continues its dance, gusting playfully to remind us of its lively presence.

This early stage is a gentle invitation to layer up—a light jacket or a cozy sweater is wise, especially as the brisk winds flutter through the avenues. As the day unfolds, the golden rays will further warm up the streets, coaxing the city out of its sleepy morning stupor. It’s a perfect moment to stroll through the local parks, perhaps visiting a nearby café for a hot cup of coffee, allowing the warmth to seep in before stepping into the vibrant life of the day. Around lunch, as the sun fully claims its throne, wandering along the waterfront or even among the gently swaying trees of Golden Gate Park may provide a serene yet invigorating escape, ideal for taking in the sights while enjoying the essence of this fabulous San Francisco day.
